title: Tool Access Type concept (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: The unique id of the tool access type. It should be something meaningful, like a short word or an acronym

_type.title: The document type. In this case, fixed to ToolAccessType

_version.title: The document type version. In this case, fixed to 0.2

description.title: Description of this tool access type
